sentences.en: Desegregation may be harder to enforce in rural areas.
sentences.cn: 要废除农村地区的种族隔离可能会更困难一些。

sentences.en: Lincoln did much work on desegregation in USA.
sentences.cn: 林肯在消除种族歧视上做了很多工作.

sentences.en: Soon afterward, the president appointed a federal task force to enforce desegregation along Route 40.
sentences.cn: 不久以后，肯尼迪成立了一个联邦专责小组来解决40号公路上的种族隔离问题。
